com.ecs.utils.stellent.embedded
Class FWFacade

java.lang.Object
  com.ecs.utils.stellent.embedded.FWFacade
public class FWFacade
extends java.lang.Object

The FWFacade provides a wrapper for all calls to the intradoc.data.Workspace object. It can only be called when running within the SCS.

Author:
gs

createSequence

public void createSequence(java.lang.String key)
                    throws intradoc.data.DataException
Call the createSequence method indicating to use default caching. Caching should not be used if the Sequence has to strictly increment by 1, without 'jumping'. For unique ID's, etc it is generally ok to use the default cache (usually 20).

Parameters:
key -
Throws:
intradoc.data.DataException

createSequence

public void createSequence(java.lang.String key,
                           int cacheSize)
                    throws intradoc.data.DataException
Create a database counter on the passed key. Remember to namespace your key so do not use a document dDocName for example but ensure you prefix it with an application reference.

Parameters:
key -
Throws:
intradoc.data.DataException
